hero.title: Computer Society
hero.subtitle: Empowering the next generation of computer scientists through coding, innovation, and collaborative learning experiences.

about.title: About Computer Society
about.description: The Computer Society is dedicated to fostering excellence in computer science and software development. Our community provides a platform for students to learn, code, and innovate together, preparing them for successful careers in technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower students with programming skills, foster innovation in software development, and create a vibrant community of passionate coders who collaborate, learn, and grow together.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become a leading computer science community recognized for excellence in coding, innovation, and contribution to the global tech ecosystem.

items.title: Programming Excellence
items.description: Master various programming languages and frameworks through hands-on coding sessions and collaborative projects.

items.title: Software Development
items.description: Learn full-stack development, mobile app creation, and software engineering best practices.

items.title: Competitive Programming
items.description: Participate in coding contests, hackathons, and algorithmic challenges to sharpen your problem-solving skills.

items.title: Open Source
items.description: Contribute to open-source projects and build a portfolio that showcases your coding expertise.

items.title: Tech Community
items.description: Connect with fellow developers, industry professionals, and tech enthusiasts from around the world.

items.title: Workshops & Seminars
items.description: Attend technical workshops, coding bootcamps, and guest lectures by industry experts.

activities.title: Our Activities
activities.subtitle: Explore the exciting coding projects and activities we organize throughout the year

items.title: Web Development Projects
items.description: Build modern web applications using React, Next.js, Node.js, and other cutting-edge technologies.

items.title: Mobile App Development
items.description: Create iOS and Android applications using Flutter, React Native, and native development tools.

items.title: Data Structures & Algorithms
items.description: Master fundamental computer science concepts through practice problems and coding challenges.

items.title: Machine Learning Projects
items.description: Explore AI and ML through hands-on projects using Python, TensorFlow, and other ML frameworks.

cta.title: Ready to Code the Future?
cta.description: Become part of our coding community and help shape the future of technology. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, there's a place for you here.
